root: ^0-Hi, this is the first time you've been to Basorexia-4
^Yes, I find Basorexia a wonderful place with lotta job opportunities
^I visited this city once when I was a child. Before moving to here, I felt like I needed to come earn money in such a thriving city

find: ^1-Yeah I think that's why I see thousands of people coming to us every year-5
^I am no exception this year tho. laugh
^I don't find any thing illoogical. That's urbanization
no: ^2-Welcome to Basorexia. Hope it treat you well-0
^Hope so. Thanks for making me so ready
^And I'm gonna treat Basorexia and Basorexian well too
dont: ^5-Agree. I look forward to new people bringing about new ideas of life-0
^Trust me, I'm confident in my freshness and creativity
^Everything needs to renew in this day and age
vistited: ^8-Interesting. You have your motivation, and you're gonna have to work so hard-5
^Sure. My desire to earn money is burning because I can't stand seeing my younger sibling dropping out of school anymore
^I know it'll be tough sometimes, but yeah, I think I'm gonna grow up though tough times
sure: ^9-Oh that's a pity. But I see your fire, so you go girl-6
tough: ^10-Definitely. Talk to me in case you need some help-0
